title: A sublinear-time approximation scheme for bin packing

references.title: A linear programming approach to the cutting-stock problem – Part II.
references.raw: P. Gilmore and R. Gomory. A linear programming approach to the cutting-stock problem – Part II. Operations Research, 11: 863–888, 1963.

references.title: A self-organizing bin packing heuristic.
references.raw: J. Csirik, D. Johnson, C. Kenyon, P. Shor, and R. Weber. A self-organizing bin packing heuristic. Proceedings of Algorithm Engineering and Experimentation (ALENEX), 1999.

references.title: A sublinear time approximation scheme for clustering in metric spaces.
references.raw: P. Indyk. A sublinear time approximation scheme for clustering in metric spaces. Proceedings of the 40th IEEE Symposium on Foundations of Computer Science (FOCS), pp. 154–159, 1999.

references.title: Approximating Average Parameters of Graphs.
references.raw: O. Goldreich and D. Ron. Approximating Average Parameters of Graphs. Proceedings of 10th RANDOM, pp. 363-374, 2006.

references.title: Approximating the minimum spanning tree weight in sublinear time.
references.raw: B. Chazelle, R. Rubinfeld, and L. Trevisan. Approximating the minimum spanning tree weight in sublinear time. Proceedings of the 28th International Colloquium on Automata, Languages and Programming, pp. 190–200, 2001.

references.title: Approximating the Weight of the Euclidean Minimum Spanning Tree in Sublinear Time.
references.raw: A. Czumaj, F. Ergun, L. Fortnow, A. Magen, I. Newman, R. Rubinfeld, and C. Sohler. Approximating the Weight of the Euclidean Minimum Spanning Tree in Sublinear Time. SIAM Journal on Computing, 34(1):91-109, 2005.

references.title: Approximation Algorithms For Bin Packing Problems: A Survey.
references.raw: M. R. Garey and D. S. Johnson. Approximation Algorithms For Bin Packing Problems: A Survey. In Analysis and Design of Algorithms in Combinatorial Optimization, G. Ausiello and M. Lucertini (editors), Springer-Verlag, 1981, 147-172. 15[13] P. Gilmore and R. Gomory. A linear programming approach to the cutting-stock problem. Operations Research, 9:849–859, 1961.

references.title: Bin packing can be solved within 1+epsilon in linear time.
references.raw: W. Fernandez de la Vega and G. S. Lueker: Bin packing can be solved within 1+epsilon in linear time. Combinatorica 1(4): 349-355 (1981).

references.title: Estimating Sum by Weighted Sampling.
references.raw: R. Motwani, R. Panigrahy, and Y. Xu. Estimating Sum by Weighted Sampling. Proceedings of the 34th Annual International Colloquium on Automata, Languages and Programming (ICALP), pp. 53–64, 2007.

references.title: Estimating the weight of metric minimum spanning trees in sublinear-time.
references.raw: A. Czumaj and C. Sohler. Estimating the weight of metric minimum spanning trees in sublinear-time. Proceedings of the 36th ACM Symposium on Theory of Computing, pp. 175– 183, 2004.

references.title: Facility Location in Sublinear Time.
references.raw: M. B˘ adoiu, A. Czumaj, P. Indyk, and C. Sohler. Facility Location in Sublinear Time. Proceedings of the 32nd International Colloquium on Automata, Languages and Programming, pp. 866–877, 2005.

references.title: On approximation the minimum vertex cover in sublinear time and the connection to distributed algorithms.
references.raw: M. Parnas and D. Ron. On approximation the minimum vertex cover in sublinear time and the connection to distributed algorithms. Electronic Colloquium on Computational Complexity(ECCC), 94, 2005.

references.title: On sums of independent random variables with unbounded variance, and estimating the average degree in a graph.
references.raw: U. Feige. On sums of independent random variables with unbounded variance, and estimating the average degree in a graph. Proceedings of the of the 36th Annual ACM Symposium on Theory of Computing (STOC), pp. 594–603, 2004.

references.title: On the sum-of-squares algorithm for bin-packing.
references.raw: J. Csirik, D. Johnson, C. Kenyon, J. Orlin, P. Shor, and R. Weber. On the sum-of-squares algorithm for bin-packing. Proceedings of the 32nd Annual ACM Symposium on Theory of Computing (STOC), pp. 208–217, 2000.

references.title: Optimal time bounds for approximate clustering.
references.raw: R. R. Mettu and C. G. Plaxton. Optimal time bounds for approximate clustering. Machine Learning, 56(1–3): 35–60, July 2004.

references.title: Property Testing and its Connection to Learning and Approximation.
references.raw: O. Goldreich, S. Goldwasser, and D. Ron. Property Testing and its Connection to Learning and Approximation. Journal of the ACM, 45(4):653-750, 1998.

references.title: Property Testing in Bounded Degree Graphs.
references.raw: O. Goldreich and D. Ron. Property Testing in Bounded Degree Graphs. Algorithmica, 20(2):165–183, 2002.

references.title: Quick k-median, k-center, and facility location for sparse graphs.
references.raw: M. Thorup. Quick k-median, k-center, and facility location for sparse graphs. SIAM Journal on Computing, 34(2): 405–432 2004.

references.title: Shmoys: Using dual approximation algorithms for scheduling problems theoretical and practical results.
references.raw: D. S. Hochbaum and D. B. Shmoys: Using dual approximation algorithms for scheduling problems theoretical and practical results. Journal of the ACM 34(1): 144-162, 1987.

references.title: Sublinear time algorithms for metric space problems.
references.raw: P. Indyk. Sublinear time algorithms for metric space problems. Proceedings of the 31st Annual ACM Symposium on Theory of Computing (STOC), pp. 428–434, 1999.

references.title: Sublinear time approximate clustering.
references.raw: N. Mishra, D. Oblinger, and L. Pitt. Sublinear time approximate clustering. Proceedings of the 12th Annual ACM-SIAM Symposium on Discrete Algorithms (SODA), pp. 439–447, 2001.

references.title: Sublinear-time approximation algorithms for clustering via random sampling.
references.raw: A. Czumaj and C. Sohler. Sublinear-time approximation algorithms for clustering via random sampling. Random Structures & Algorithms, 30(1-2):226–256, 2007.

references.title: The complexity of approximating the entropy.
references.raw: Tu˘ gkan Batu, Sanjoy Dasgupta, Ravi Kumar, and Ronitt Rubinfeld. The complexity of approximating the entropy. SIAM Journal on Computing, 35(1):132–150, 2005.

references.title: The Cutting-Stock Approach to Bin Packing: Theory and Experiments.
references.raw: D. Applegate, L. Buriol, B. Dillard, D. Johnson, and P. Shor. The Cutting-Stock Approach to Bin Packing: Theory and Experiments. Proceedings of Algorithm Engineering and Experimentation (ALENEX),pp.1–15, 2003.
